Generation V.Black: When attacked, it defends itself by closing the lid of its shell. It can spit a sticky, poisonous liquid.
Generation V.White: It evolves when bathed in an electric-like energy along with Karrablast . The reason is still unknown.
Generation V.Black 2: When it and Karrablast are together, and both receive electrical stimulation, they both evolve.
Generation V.White 2: When it and Karrablast are together, and both receive electrical stimulation, they both evolve.

Generation VI.X: When it and Karrablast are together, and both receive electrical stimulation, they both evolve.
Generation VI.Y: It evolves when bathed in an electric-like energy along with Karrablast . The reason is still unknown.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: When it and Karrablast are together, and both receive electrical stimulation, they both evolve.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: It evolves when bathed in an electric-like energy along with Karrablast . The reason is still unknown.

Generation VIII.Sword: When attacked, it tightly shuts the lid of its shell. This reaction fails to protect it from Karrablast , however, because they can still get into the shell.
Generation VIII.Shield: It has a strange physiology that responds to electricity. When together with Karrablast , Shelmet evolves for some reason.

Generation V.Black: Route 8 , Icirrus City , Moor of Icirrus Spring Summer Autumn
Generation V.White: Route 8 , Icirrus City , Moor of Icirrus Spring Summer Autumn
Generation V.Black 2: Routes 6 and 11 Route 8 , Icirrus City , Moor of Icirrus Spring Summer Autumn
Generation V.White 2: Routes 6 and 11 Route 8 , Icirrus City , Moor of Icirrus Spring Summer Autumn

Generation VIII.Sword: Route 7 , Bridge Field , Hammerlocke Hills , Motostoke Riverbank Rolling Fields , Dappled Grove , South Lake Miloch , Bridge Field ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield: Route 7 , Bridge Field , Hammerlocke Hills , Motostoke Riverbank , Giant's Cap Rolling Fields , Dappled Grove , South Lake Miloch , Bridge Field ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Sword Expansion Pass: Soothing Wetlands , Giant's Bed Forest of Focus , Training Lowlands ( Wanderer )
Generation VIII.Shield Expansion Pass: Soothing Wetlands , Giant's Bed Training Lowlands ( Wanderer )
